1550650.name: Lords of Solgrund
1550650.description:
Lords of Solgrund combines elements of real time strategy, city building and other unique additions. The game features detailed animations, complex gameplay systems inspired by the early middle ages and combined with magical, spiritual and other fantastical elements that are based in an entirely seperate reality from ours.

Discord

Join the Lords of Solgrund community on discord to share your opinions, ideas and get the earliest updates and further insight into the development.

Gameplay

Before the game starts, you will choose a faction. Each faction has several positive or negative attributes, such as having head start on specific researches, cheaper market prices, stronger or weaker soldiers and more. While in game you can pick your school of magic that determines what kind of spells your spell book will have access to. Each school of magic has a different theme with a set of spells associated with it.

During the game, you will manage your economy and ensure your people have enough to eat and have decent housing. Houses can be upgraded to have higher income and hygiene but also require more needs and luxuries, such as furniture, clothing or decorations.

Editor

Create your own custom maps, campaigns or mini scenarios with the ingame editor and share them with other people!

Localization

The game is built to support as many languages as possible, you can volunteer to help translate the entire game into your native language (or any language you are fluent in). Localizing maps and campaigns is also possible.

!!! Please keep in mind localization is community-driven. There may be words missing or wrongly translated as the translation lags behind development !!!
1550650.supported_languages: 英语, 捷克语, 罗马尼亚语, 德语, 波兰语, 匈牙利语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 俄语, 意大利语
